title: Science Concept Education Program for Visually Impaired Adult Learners (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic scientific terminology and acquired daily living skills
context.additional_context: Need to establish tactile/auditory-centered science learning environments for visually impaired learners

learning_goals: Visually impaired learners can explain 10 core science concepts related to daily life
Explore 5 scientific principles using experimental tools (tactile models, sound-generating devices, etc.)
Apply the scientific problem-solving process with over 80% accuracy through case analysis activities

constraints.accessibility: 시각 장애 학습자 접근성 보장을 위한 다중 감각 자료 필수
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
